thought: The first step is to create a file with 2 numbers on two lines, one with more than 20 digits. I will paste the numbers into the editor.
The next step is to select both lines. I will use the highlight action to select from line 1 to line 2.

Now that the lines are selected, I need to navigate to the 'Edit' menu, then 'Line operations', and finally 'Sort Lines as Integers Ascending'. I will start by moving to the 'Edit' menu and clicking it.
Now that the 'Edit' menu is open, I need to navigate to 'Line Operations'. I will move the mouse to the 'Line Operations' menu item and click it.
Now that the 'Line Operations' submenu is open, I need to click on 'Sort Lines as Integers Ascending'. I will move the mouse to the 'Sort Lines as Integers Ascending' menu item and click it.
